name: Instant Pot Pulled BBQ Jackfruit
description: Pulled BBQ Jackfruit made in the Instant Pot! Super quick and easy dinner that resembles pulled pork sandwiches. Use homemade barbecue sauce or store bought.
recipeIngredient: (2) 20 ounce cans young green jackfruit in brine (or water)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your jackfruit: Drain and rinse the canned jackfruit, then chop off the core portions and discard.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare your jackfruit: Drain and rinse the canned jackfruit, then chop off the core portions and discard.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the jackfruit to the Instant Pot along with 1 cup of water. Put on the lid, seal, and set to high pressure for 5 minutes. Allow the pressure to release naturally, or if you are in a hurry you can manually release the pressure (carefully.)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the jackfruit to the Instant Pot along with 1 cup of water. Put on the lid, seal, and set to high pressure for 5 minutes. Allow the pressure to release naturally, or if you are in a hurry you can manually release the pressure (carefully.)

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the jackfruit, and then add it back to the Instant Pot. Mash with a potato masher until it resembles pulled meat.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the jackfruit, and then add it back to the Instant Pot. Mash with a potato masher until it resembles pulled meat.

recipeInstructions.text: If using homemade, make the vegan barbecue sauce now.
recipeInstructions.name: If using homemade, make the vegan barbecue sauce now.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the barbecue sauce to the pulled jackfruit, and turn on the sauté feature. Cook for 2-5 minutes until warmed through. Serve on buns with shredded cabbage or coleslaw.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the barbecue sauce to the pulled jackfruit, and turn on the sauté feature. Cook for 2-5 minutes until warmed through. Serve on buns with shredded cabbage or coleslaw.
